entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
